pseudo:
假的，虚伪的；
 [口]假冒的人，伪君子；
This paper has focused on Pseudo - Chaotic Time Hopping scheme which is based on Impulse Radio system.
本文着重讨论的是伪混沌跳时(Pseudo-ChaoticTimeHopping )结构,这是一个基于脉冲无线电的系统.
A class of pseudo logical algebras - pseudo NM algebras are proposed their properties are investigated in detail.
提出了一类逻辑代数一伪NM代数,详细地探讨了伪NM代数 的基本性质,给出了伪NM代数 的等价刻画,从而证明了伪NM代数类是一个簇.
The precision of pseudo - range measurement determines the precision of pseudo - range positioning .
伪距测量精度决定了伪 距定位 的精度.
An Introduction on concrete construction method of external pseudo - cobble facing and pseudo - undressed granite facing.
介绍外墙仿卵石、仿毛面花岗岩饰面的混凝土施工方法.
This paper introduces some perceptron algorithms and their variations, gives various pseudo - codes, out advantage among algorithms.
介绍感知器学习算法及其变种, 给出各种感知器算法的 伪 代码, 指出各种算法的优点.
